patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,18 @@
+name: ckuxCheck
+on: 
+    pull_request_target:
+        types: [opened, synchronize, reopened]
+
+permissions:
+    contents: read
+    pull-requests: read
+    checks: write
+
+jobs:
+    ckux-check:
+        uses: kuchune/.github/.github/workflows/ckux-check.yml@develop
+        secrets:
+            access_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
+        with:
+            repository: ${{ github.repository }}
+            check-type: "static-check"
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -1,9 +1,26 @@
 package main
-import "fmt"
+
+import (
+    "errors"
+    "fmt"
+    "math"
+)
+
+func circleArea(radius float64) (float64, error) {
+    if radius < 0 { 		// Â¶ÇÊûúÂ∞è‰∫é0ÂàôËøêË°å‰ª•‰∏ã
+        return 0, errors.New("Area calculation failed, radius is less than zero")
+    }
+    return math.Pi * radius * radius, nil
+}
+
 func main() {
-    var a string = "Runoob"
-    fmt.Println(a)
+    radius := -10.00
+    area, err := circleArea(radius)
+    if err != nil { 		// Â¶ÇÊûú‰∏∫Á©∫
+        fmt.Println(err)
+        return
+    }
+    fmt.Printf("Area of circle %0.2f", area)
+}
